name: Slay the Spire Text Adventure [Prototype]
description:
I'm a big fan of Slay the Spire and I'm interested in choose your own adventure games so I decided to see if I could convert a small piece of the game into a text based adventure!

This game was designed with the idea that those who played it would have the basic understanding of what cards did/energy cost etc. Sorry if you are confused!
Strike - deals 6 damage (1 energy)

Defend - adds 5 armour (1 energy)

Bash - deals 8 damage. Applies 2 vulnerable to target (2 energy).

The game was quickly made over the weekend and would have a lot of issues if I tried to expand on this but maybe one day I'll build it up properly!

Slay the Spire is a game made by MegaCrit: check it out!
